refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: ASN1_STRING_new() returns an allocated ASN1_STRING structure. Its type is undefined.
ASN1_STRING_type_new() returns an allocated ASN1_STRING structure of type type.
ASN1_STRING_free() frees up a. If a is NULL nothing is done.

refsection.title: NOTES
refsection.para: Other string types call the ASN1_STRING functions. For example ASN1_OCTET_STRING_new() calls ASN1_STRING_type(V_ASN1_OCTET_STRING).

refsection.title: RETURN VALUES
refsection.para: ASN1_STRING_new() and ASN1_STRING_type_new() return a valid ASN1_STRING structure or NULL if an error occurred.
ASN1_STRING_free() does not return a value.
